attributes.title: Makes me sick
attributes.review: This whole app is a disgusting piece of garbage. The second I opened up the app Donald Trump himself came to my house and punched my child and I in the face. If you wish to download this app, hide yo kids. 💀

attributes.title: GAVE ME FOOT FUNGUS🧚🏻‍♂️🧚🏼
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what this Cheeto was all about but once I downloaded it my feet began to have foot fungus the moment it downloaded and then started playing shawte🙇🏻‍♀️ like a melody🎶🎶 in my head🤦🏻‍♀️ and then gave me acne and proceeded to HARASSE me

attributes.title: THIS APP SHOULD BE CANCELLED
attributes.review: First off I got this app to see things going down and I literally say it’s the worst there are so many servays and too many disrespectful things on here please delete this app and Karamas here. 😚

attributes.title: WORST APP IN THE APP STORE
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it made my phone completely stop working! it’s a terrible use of the storage I have available and I urge anyone reading this to NEVER download this app!

attributes.title: DISGOSTANG 👆🏻👇🏻🤜🏻🤛🏻👂🦻👄🦷👁
attributes.review: Truly horrified and disgusted. I first opened it and saw an image of a large orange 🍊 Oompa Loompa with his fist up and I began to vomit 🤮 I immediately had to throw my phone across the room and smash it 👏 with a 🔨hammer. Somebody send Help my eyes have fallen please someone.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app gives you dry skin AND acne. Like what the heck. I can’t believe I trusted Fox News to recommend this. They also threw my hamster down the stairs and set fire to the hamster ball. Will never eat here again

attributes.title: terrible app!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app and it was so bad it didn’t have to get to it and i’m not really really cool and it’s kinda like it is a little while it is fun and it’s so funny to see me and my favorite color is to my friends like that and it’s kinda cute but it’s so funny and weird to get it to my phone to get it back and it’s just really bad. don’t download 😡

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: Ever since I’ve gotten this app, my phone battery has been drastically draining. Also, my pet turtles died within 2 days after getting the app so I think it’s cursed.

attributes.title: DISAPPOINTED
attributes.review: This app aggravated me so much! As soon as I downloaded it my phone immediately blew up in my face and burnt my house down. Would not recommend to others!!!!

attributes.title: THIS MADE ME ANGRY 😢😡🤨😭
attributes.review: I DOWNLOADED THE APP BECAUSE I WANT TO SUPORT BY FAV OMPA LOOMPA 🤪🍊BUT WHEN I WENT TO OPEN THE APP IT STARTED THROWING ELEPHANTS AT ME AFTER IT STOPED AND I WAS ON DEATHS DOOR STEP I THOUGHT MY LAST SIGHT COULD BE MY ORANGE FRIEND BUT I TOOK MY IPAD AWAY WHEN I WAS KNOCKED OUT SO AS MY LAST DYING WISH I GOT UP WENT TO MY SWIMMING CANTALOUPE 🍈 AND HOPED ON WE RODE BIKES TO THE NEAREST IKEA BUT THEN A LADY CAME TO THE DOOR AND STOPED ME AND SAID “MAM THIS IS NOT AN IKEA” I LOOKED AROUND AND WE WERE IN A JUNGLE MONKEYS STARTED STEALING MY POKET DOGS(hot dogs in my poket) SO I CHASED AFTER THEM AND THEN I HAD TO STOP BECAUSE I ALMOST WALKED OF A CLIFF BUT THE MY CANTALOUPE GREW WINGS AND FLEW ME BACK HOME 🏡 SO FOR UR OWN SAFTY DO NOT GET THIS APP😡😱😭⚠️
